title: What problems can gun control solve? | The Weeds
description:
Matt, Dara, and Vox's Jerusalem Demsas discuss the politics of progressive control proposals that rise to the fore in the wake of mass shootings, and whether or not they can be effective at curing the real ills of gun violence in America.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
